text: sillo hananim-ui gyeyaggwa geudeul-ui maengselosseo hachanh-eun iig-eul chaeng-gineun jadeul, geuleohan jadeul-egeneun sillo naeseeseo geudeul-eul wihan mogs-ilan eobs-eumyeo, buhwal-ui nal hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege malsseum-eul geoljido, geudeul-eul chyeodabojido, geudeul-eul jeonghwahajido anh-eusil geos-imyeo geudeul-egeneun gotongseuleon beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
